trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering"> </xref> evento o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Filtering is supported when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> value.
trans-unit.target: Há suporte para filtragem quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>estiver definida como o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode>valor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create an SqlDataSourceFilteringEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um delegado SqlDataSourceFilteringEventHandler, identifica o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
